name: AIOP NodeJS
apidoc:
Information

Authentication

All the methods of the api, except the sign in one, need the user to be logged in, at least.
First, you'll need to send your credentials to the /signin URI and get the accesstoken in return.
This accesstoken should be sent with every request, then.

  • Query url?access_token=token
  • Body {"access_token":"token"}
  • Header Authorization: Bearer token

Authorization

When a method send back a 401 Unauthorized method, don't forget to check the WWW-Authenticate header to get some additional details on the failure.
